Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip, further traces of a brown resinous deposit, and remains of one line of incised Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394775) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394775)
